bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for High Performance Serial Bus Bridges
IEEE Standard for High Performance Serial Bus Bridges

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The model, definition, and behaviors of High Performance Serial Bus bridges, which are devices that can be used to interconnect two separately enumerable buses, are specified
The model, definition, and behaviors of High Performance Serial Bus bridges, which are devices that can be used to interconnect two separately enumerable buses, are specified.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
